snippet: Royalty Pharma sweetened its hostile takeover offer for Elan, the Irish drug company, on Friday for the second time in a month after it failed to get enough support from Elan’s shareholders.
abstract: Royalty Pharma sweetened its hostile takeover offer for Elan, the Irish drug company, on Friday for the second time in a month after it failed to get enough support from Elan’s shareholders.

headline.main: Royalty Pharma Raises Its Bid for Elan Again
headline.print_headline: Royalty Pharma Again Raises Its Hostile Bid For Elan
